dict.string:
LANG=ja_JP.UTF-8 q="{query}"
IFS=',' set -- $q
tsk="$1" dat="$2" tim="$3"
if echo "$q" | grep -q @n; then type=Note pre="" task=`echo "${tsk}" | sed 's/@n//'` else type=Task pre="- " if echo "${dat}${tim}" | grep -q [0-9]; then [ `echo "$dat" | grep "^+[0-9]\+$"` ];RP=$? [ `echo "$dat" | grep "^[0-9]\{1,2\}$"` ];RD=$? [ `echo "$dat" | grep "^[0-9]\{1,2\}-[0-9]\{1,2\}$"` ];RM=$? [ `echo "$dat" | grep "^[0-9]\{4\}-[0-9]\{1,2\}-[0-9]\{1,2\}$"` ];RY=$? case "${RP}${RD}${RM}${RY}" in 0111) dat=`date -v${dat}d '+%Y-%m-%d'` ;; 1011) dat=`echo -n 0$dat | tail -c 2` if [ "$dat" -lt `date '+%d'` ];then month=`date -v+1m '+%Y-%m'` else month=`date '+%Y-%m'` fi dat="$month"-"$dat" ;; 1101) dat=`expr "0${dat}" : '[0-9]*\([0-9]\{2\}\)-'`-`echo $dat | sed -e 's/^[0-9]*-//' -e 's/^/0/' | tail -c 3` if [ `echo "$dat" | tr -dc [0-9]` -lt `date '+%m%d'` ];then year=`date -v+1y '+%Y'` else year=`date '+%Y'` fi dat="$year"-"$dat" ;; 1110) dat=`echo "${dat}" | head -c 4`-`echo "$dat" | sed -e 's/^[0-9]*-[0-9]\{1,2\}-//' -e 's/^/0/' | tail -c 3`-`echo ${dat} | sed -e 's/^[0-9]*-[0-9]*-//' -e 's/^/0/' | tail -c 3` ;; esac if [ -z "${tim}" ]; then tag="@due(${dat} 23:59)" else if echo "${tim}" | grep -q "^[0-9]\{1,2\}$";then tim=`echo "0${tim}:00" | tail -c 6` fi if echo "${tim}" | grep -q "^[0-9]\{3,4\}$";then tim=`echo 0${tim}| tail -c 5 | sed 's/\(..\)$/:\1/'` fi if echo "$tim" | grep -q '^[0-9]*[mh]$';then tim=`echo $tim | tr h,m H,M` tim=`date -v+${tim} '+%H:%M'` fi if [ -z "${dat}" ]; then dat=`date '+%Y-%m-%d'` fi tag="@remind(${dat} ${tim})" fi else tag="" fi fi
add=`echo "${tsk} ${tag}" | sed -e 's/&/\&/g' -e 's/</\</g' -e 's/>/\>/g' -e "s/'/\'/g" -e 's/"/\"/g'` cat << EOB <?xml version="1.0"?> <items> <item uid="Listacular" arg="${type},${pre},${add}" valid="YES" > <title>${type}: ${add}</title> </item> </items> EOB

todotxt=`cat path | xargs echo -n` IFS=',' read type pre task <<< "{query}"
l1=`tail -c 1 $todotxt` if [ -n "$l1" ];then echo "" >> $todotxt fi echo -n "${pre}${task}" >> $todotxt
echo "${type}: ${task}"

todotxt=`cat path | xargs echo -n`
IFS=$'\n'
q="{query}"
cat << EOB <?xml version="1.0"?> <items> EOB
for task in `grep -in "^- .*$q" "$todotxt"` do text=`echo $task | sed -e 's/^[0-9]*:- //' -e 's/&/\&/g' -e 's/</\</g' -e 's/>/\>/g' -e "s/'/\'/g" -e 's/"/\"/g'` num=`echo $task | sed 's/\(^[0-9]*\):.*/\1/'` cat << EOB <item uid="Listacular" arg="${num}" valid="YES" > <title>${num}: ${text}</title> <subtitle>Make task done</subtitle> </item> EOB done
cat << EOB </items> EOB

# Add gsed to 'PATH' PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin IFS=$'\n' todotxt=`cat path | xargs echo -n` num="{query}"
task=`sed -n ${num}p $todotxt | sed 's/- //'` gsed -in "${num}s/^- /x /" $todotxt echo "done: $task"
Enter your Todo.txt absolute path to Argument

todotxt=`cat path | xargs echo -n`
IFS=' '
query="{query}" read q due <<< "$query"
IFS=',' read dat tim <<< "$due"
if echo "${dat}${tim}" | grep -q [0-9]; then if [ -z "${tim}" ]; then [ `echo "$dat" | grep "^+[0-9]\+$"` ];RP=$? [ `echo "$dat" | grep "^[0-9]\{1,2\}$"` ];RD=$? [ `echo "$dat" | grep "^[0-9]\{1,2\}-[0-9]\{1,2\}$"` ];RM=$? [ `echo "$dat" | grep "^[0-9]\{4\}-[0-9]\{1,2\}-[0-9]\{1,2\}$"` ];RY=$? case "${RP}${RD}${RM}${RY}" in 0111) dat=`date -v${dat}d '+%Y-%m-%d'` ;; 1011) dat=`echo -n 0$dat | tail -c 2` if [ "$dat" -lt `date '+%d'` ];then month=`date -v+1m '+%Y-%m'` else month=`date '+%Y-%m'` fi dat="$month"-"$dat" ;; 1101) dat=`expr "0${dat}" : '[0-9]*\([0-9]\{2\}\)-'`-`echo $dat | sed -e 's/^[0-9]*-//' -e 's/^/0/' | tail -c 3` if [ `echo "$dat" | tr -dc [0-9]` -lt `date '+%m%d'` ];then year=`date -v+1y '+%Y'` else year=`date '+%Y'` fi dat="$year"-"$dat" ;; 1110) dat=`echo "${dat}" | head -c 4`-`echo "$dat" | sed -e 's/^[0-9]*-[0-9]\{1,2\}-//' -e 's/^/0/' | tail -c 3`-`echo ${dat} | sed -e 's/^[0-9]*-[0-9]*-//' -e 's/^/0/' | tail -c 3` ;; esac tag="@due(${dat} 23:59)" else if echo "${tim}" | grep -q "^[0-9]\{1,2\}$";then tim=`echo "0${tim}:00" | tail -c 6` fi if echo "${tim}" | grep -q "^[0-9]\{3,4\}$";then tim=`echo 0${tim}| tail -c 5 | sed 's/\(..\)$/:\1/'` fi if echo "$tim" | grep -q '^[0-9]*[mh]$';then tim=`echo $tim | tr h,m H,M` dat=`date -v+${tim} '+%Y-%m-%d'` tim=`date -v+${tim} '+%H:%M'` fi if [ -z "${dat}" ]; then date=`date '+%Y-%m-%d'` fi tag="@remind(${dat} ${tim})" fi modst="New tag: ${tag}" else modst="Input new due date,time" fi
IFS=$'\n'
cat << EOB <?xml version="1.0"?> <items> EOB
for task in `grep -in "^- .*$q" "$todotxt"` do text=`echo $task | sed -e 's/^[0-9]*:- //' -e 's/&/\&/g' -e 's/</\</g' -e 's/>/\>/g' -e "s/'/\'/g" -e 's/"/\"/g'` num=`echo $task | sed 's/\(^[0-9]*\):.*/\1/'` cat << EOB <item uid="Listacular" arg="${num} ${tag}" valid="YES" > <title>${num}: ${text}</title> <subtitle>Make task done</subtitle> <subtitle mod="ctrl">${modst}</subtitle> </item> EOB done
cat << EOB </items> EOB

# Add gsed to 'PATH' PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin IFS=' ' todotxt=`cat path | xargs echo -n` read num tag <<< "{query}"
gsed -in -e '${num}s/^[x|-]* */- /' -e '${num}s/@[remind|reminded|due]\(.*\)/${tag}/' $todotxt task=`sed -n ${num}p $todotxt | sed 's/^- //'` echo "New tag seted: $task"

Alfred text format: 'lc task,date,time'
Further details can be viewed at the following URL.
http://github.com/catfist/Alfred-Add-to-Listacular
